  • Methodendetails

    • getAccountPreview

      @GetMapping("/validate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAccountPreview(@RequestParam String email, @RequestParam String secret)
      Parameter:
      email - the email of the account to get the preview from
      secret - the secret to access the account informatiosn
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information of the process and the account preview

    • getAccountInfo

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}") public AccountInformation getAccountInfo(@PathVariable String accountId)
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the account information from
      Gibt zurück:
      AccountInformation information of the specified account

    • getBookedEvents

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}/booked-events") public List<EventInformation> getBookedEvents(@PathVariable String accountId)
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the booked events from
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the booked events of the given account

    • getManagedEvents

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}/managed-events") public List<EventInformation> getManagedEvents(@PathVariable String accountId)
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the managed events from
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the managed events of the given account

    • getExploreEvents

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}/explore-events") public List<EventInformation> getExploreEvents(@PathVariable String accountId)
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get a list of events to explore for
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with events to explore for the specified account

    • getManagedOrganization

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}/managed-organizations") public List<OrganizationInformation> getManagedOrganization(@PathVariable String accountId)
      get organizations where the given account has the role "administrator"
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with information of the organizations where the account is administrator

    • createAccount

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createAccount(@RequestBody FleventsAccount account)
      create a new account
      Parameter:
      account - the account to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information about the process

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity resetPassword(@RequestParam String email)
      sends a mail with a link to reset the passwort for the account with the specified mail
      Parameter:
      email - the email of the account where to reset the password
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information about the process

    • editAccount

      @PostMapping("/{accountId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity editAccount(@PathVariable String accountId, @RequestBody FleventsAccount account)
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to be edited
      account - the account object with the new information of the account
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with information about the process
